projects.name: Animedle
projects.description: An interactive web application focused on clean UI, frontend logic, and engaging user interaction through a progressive guessing mechanic.

projects.name: JBrain
projects.description: An educational quiz game with teacher and student roles, customizable features, user accounts, and persistent results stored in a database.

projects.name: MyFit

projects.name: Plant It
